116/**
117 * Coprocessor that has both the MasterObserver and RegionObserver implemented that supports in
118 * visibility labels
119 */
120@CoreCoprocessor
121@InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate(HBaseInterfaceAudience.CONFIG)
122// TODO: break out Observer functions into separate class/sub-class.
123public class VisibilityController implements MasterCoprocessor, RegionCoprocessor,
124  VisibilityLabelsService.Interface, MasterObserver, RegionObserver {
125
126  private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(VisibilityController.class);
127  private static final Logger AUDITLOG =
128    LoggerFactory.getLogger("SecurityLogger." + VisibilityController.class.getName());
129  // flags if we are running on a region of the 'labels' table
130  private boolean labelsRegion = false;
131  // Flag denoting whether AcessController is available or not.
132  private boolean accessControllerAvailable = false;
133  private Configuration conf;
134  private volatile boolean initialized = false;
135  private boolean checkAuths = false;
136  /** Mapping of scanner instances to the user who created them */
137  private Map<InternalScanner, String> scannerOwners = new MapMaker().weakKeys().makeMap();
138
139  private VisibilityLabelService visibilityLabelService;
140
141  /**
142   * if we are active, usually false, only true if "hbase.security.authorization" has been set to
143   * true in site configuration
144   */
145  boolean authorizationEnabled;
146
147  // Add to this list if there are any reserved tag types
148  private static ArrayList<Byte> RESERVED_VIS_TAG_TYPES = new ArrayList<>();
149  static {
150    RESERVED_VIS_TAG_TYPES.add(TagType.VISIBILITY_TAG_TYPE);
151    RESERVED_VIS_TAG_TYPES.add(TagType.VISIBILITY_EXP_SERIALIZATION_FORMAT_TAG_TYPE);
152    RESERVED_VIS_TAG_TYPES.add(TagType.STRING_VIS_TAG_TYPE);
153  }
154
155  public static boolean isCellAuthorizationSupported(Configuration conf) {
156    return AccessChecker.isAuthorizationSupported(conf);
157  }
158
159  @Override
160  public void start(CoprocessorEnvironment env) throws IOException {
161    this.conf = env.getConfiguration();
162
163    authorizationEnabled = AccessChecker.isAuthorizationSupported(conf);
164    if (!authorizationEnabled) {
165      LOG.warn("The VisibilityController has been loaded with authorization checks disabled.");
166    }
167
168    if (HFile.getFormatVersion(conf) < HFile.MIN_FORMAT_VERSION_WITH_TAGS) {
169      throw new RuntimeException("A minimum HFile version of " + HFile.MIN_FORMAT_VERSION_WITH_TAGS
170        + " is required to persist visibility labels. Consider setting " + HFile.FORMAT_VERSION_KEY
171        + " accordingly.");
172    }
173
174    // Do not create for master CPs
175    if (!(env instanceof MasterCoprocessorEnvironment)) {
176      visibilityLabelService =
177        VisibilityLabelServiceManager.getInstance().getVisibilityLabelService(this.conf);
178    }
179  }
180
181  @Override
182  public void stop(CoprocessorEnvironment env) throws IOException {
183
184  }
185
186  /**************************** Observer/Service Getters ************************************/
187  @Override
188  public Optional<RegionObserver> getRegionObserver() {
189    return Optional.of(this);
190  }
191
192  @Override
193  public Optional<MasterObserver> getMasterObserver() {
194    return Optional.of(this);
195  }
196
197  @Override
198  public Iterable<Service> getServices() {
199    return Collections
200      .singleton(VisibilityLabelsProtos.VisibilityLabelsService.newReflectiveService(this));
201  }
202
203  /********************************* Master related hooks **********************************/
204
205  @Override
206  public void postStartMaster(ObserverContext<MasterCoprocessorEnvironment> ctx)
207    throws IOException {
208    // Need to create the new system table for labels here
209    try (Admin admin = ctx.getEnvironment().getConnection().getAdmin()) {
210      if (!admin.tableExists(LABELS_TABLE_NAME)) {
211        // We will cache all the labels. No need of normal table block cache.
212        // Let the "labels" table having only one region always. We are not expecting too many
213        // labels in the system.
214        TableDescriptor tableDescriptor = TableDescriptorBuilder.newBuilder(LABELS_TABLE_NAME)
215          .setColumnFamily(ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder.newBuilder(LABELS_TABLE_FAMILY)
216            .setBloomFilterType(BloomType.NONE).setBlockCacheEnabled(false).build())
217          .setValue(TableDescriptorBuilder.SPLIT_POLICY, DisabledRegionSplitPolicy.class.getName())
218          .build();
219
220        admin.createTable(tableDescriptor);
221      }
222    }
223  }
224
225  @Override
226  public TableDescriptor preModifyTable(ObserverContext<MasterCoprocessorEnvironment> ctx,
227    TableName tableName, TableDescriptor currentDescriptor, TableDescriptor newDescriptor)
228    throws IOException {
229    if (authorizationEnabled) {
230      if (LABELS_TABLE_NAME.equals(tableName)) {
231        throw new ConstraintException("Cannot alter " + LABELS_TABLE_NAME);
232      }
233    }
234    return newDescriptor;
235  }
236
237  @Override
238  public void preDisableTable(ObserverContext<MasterCoprocessorEnvironment> ctx,
239    TableName tableName) throws IOException {
240    if (!authorizationEnabled) {
241      return;
242    }
243    if (LABELS_TABLE_NAME.equals(tableName)) {
244      throw new ConstraintException("Cannot disable " + LABELS_TABLE_NAME);
245    }
246  }
247
248  /****************************** Region related hooks ******************************/
249
250  @Override
251  public void postOpen(ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> e) {
252    // Read the entire labels table and populate the zk
253    if (e.getEnvironment().getRegion().getRegionInfo().getTable().equals(LABELS_TABLE_NAME)) {
254      this.labelsRegion = true;
255      synchronized (this) {
256        this.accessControllerAvailable =
257          CoprocessorHost.getLoadedCoprocessors().contains(AccessController.class.getName());
258      }
259      initVisibilityLabelService(e.getEnvironment());
260    } else {
261      checkAuths = e.getEnvironment().getConfiguration()
262        .getBoolean(VisibilityConstants.CHECK_AUTHS_FOR_MUTATION, false);
263      initVisibilityLabelService(e.getEnvironment());
264    }
265  }
266
267  private void initVisibilityLabelService(RegionCoprocessorEnvironment env) {
268    try {
269      this.visibilityLabelService.init(env);
270      this.initialized = true;
271    } catch (IOException ioe) {
272      LOG.error("Error while initializing VisibilityLabelService..", ioe);
273      throw new RuntimeException(ioe);
274    }
275  }
276
277  @Override
278  public void postSetSplitOrMergeEnabled(final ObserverContext<MasterCoprocessorEnvironment> ctx,
279    final boolean newValue, final MasterSwitchType switchType) throws IOException {
280  }
281
282  @Override
283  public void preBatchMutate(ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> c,
284    MiniBatchOperationInProgress<Mutation> miniBatchOp) throws IOException {
285    if (c.getEnvironment().getRegion().getRegionInfo().getTable().isSystemTable()) {
286      return;
287    }
288    // TODO this can be made as a global LRU cache at HRS level?
289    Map<String, List<Tag>> labelCache = new HashMap<>();
290    for (int i = 0; i < miniBatchOp.size(); i++) {
291      Mutation m = miniBatchOp.getOperation(i);
292      CellVisibility cellVisibility = null;
293      try {
294        cellVisibility = m.getCellVisibility();
295      } catch (DeserializationException de) {
296        miniBatchOp.setOperationStatus(i,
297          new OperationStatus(SANITY_CHECK_FAILURE, de.getMessage()));
298        continue;
299      }
300      boolean sanityFailure = false;
301      boolean modifiedTagFound = false;
302      Pair<Boolean, Tag> pair = new Pair<>(false, null);
303      for (CellScanner cellScanner = m.cellScanner(); cellScanner.advance();) {
304        Cell cell = cellScanner.current();
305        assert cell instanceof ExtendedCell;
306        pair = checkForReservedVisibilityTagPresence((ExtendedCell) cell, pair);
307        if (!pair.getFirst()) {
308          // Don't disallow reserved tags if authorization is disabled
309          if (authorizationEnabled) {
310            miniBatchOp.setOperationStatus(i, new OperationStatus(SANITY_CHECK_FAILURE,
311              "Mutation contains cell with reserved type tag"));
312            sanityFailure = true;
313          }
314          break;
315        } else {
316          // Indicates that the cell has a the tag which was modified in the src replication cluster
317          Tag tag = pair.getSecond();
318          if (cellVisibility == null && tag != null) {
319            // May need to store only the first one
320            cellVisibility = new CellVisibility(Tag.getValueAsString(tag));
321            modifiedTagFound = true;
322          }
323        }
324      }
325      if (!sanityFailure && (m instanceof Put || m instanceof Delete)) {
326        if (cellVisibility != null) {
327          String labelsExp = cellVisibility.getExpression();
328          List<Tag> visibilityTags = labelCache.get(labelsExp);
329          if (visibilityTags == null) {
330            // Don't check user auths for labels with Mutations when the user is super user
331            boolean authCheck = authorizationEnabled && checkAuths && !(isSystemOrSuperUser());
332            try {
333              visibilityTags =
334                this.visibilityLabelService.createVisibilityExpTags(labelsExp, true, authCheck);
335            } catch (InvalidLabelException e) {
336              miniBatchOp.setOperationStatus(i,
337                new OperationStatus(SANITY_CHECK_FAILURE, e.getMessage()));
338            }
339            if (visibilityTags != null) {
340              labelCache.put(labelsExp, visibilityTags);
341            }
342          }
343          if (visibilityTags != null) {
344            List<ExtendedCell> updatedCells = new ArrayList<>();
345            for (CellScanner cellScanner = m.cellScanner(); cellScanner.advance();) {
346              Cell ce = cellScanner.current();
347              assert ce instanceof ExtendedCell;
348              ExtendedCell cell = (ExtendedCell) ce;
349              List<Tag> tags = PrivateCellUtil.getTags(cell);
350              if (modifiedTagFound) {
351                // Rewrite the tags by removing the modified tags.
352                removeReplicationVisibilityTag(tags);
353              }
354              tags.addAll(visibilityTags);
355              ExtendedCell updatedCell = PrivateCellUtil.createCell(cell, tags);
356              updatedCells.add(updatedCell);
357            }
358            m.getFamilyCellMap().clear();
359            // Clear and add new Cells to the Mutation.
360            for (ExtendedCell cell : updatedCells) {
361              if (m instanceof Put) {
362                Put p = (Put) m;
363                p.add(cell);
364              } else {
365                Delete d = (Delete) m;
366                d.add(cell);
367              }
368            }
369          }
370        }
371      }
372    }
373  }
374
375  @Override
376  public void prePrepareTimeStampForDeleteVersion(ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> ctx,
377    Mutation delete, Cell cell, byte[] byteNow, Get get) throws IOException {
378    // Nothing to do if we are not filtering by visibility
379    if (!authorizationEnabled) {
380      return;
381    }
382
383    CellVisibility cellVisibility = null;
384    try {
385      cellVisibility = delete.getCellVisibility();
386    } catch (DeserializationException de) {
387      throw new IOException("Invalid cell visibility specified " + delete, de);
388    }
389    // The check for checkForReservedVisibilityTagPresence happens in preBatchMutate happens.
390    // It happens for every mutation and that would be enough.
391    List<Tag> visibilityTags = new ArrayList<>();
392    if (cellVisibility != null) {
393      String labelsExp = cellVisibility.getExpression();
394      try {
395        visibilityTags =
396          this.visibilityLabelService.createVisibilityExpTags(labelsExp, false, false);
397      } catch (InvalidLabelException e) {
398        throw new IOException("Invalid cell visibility specified " + labelsExp, e);
399      }
400    }
401    get.setFilter(new DeleteVersionVisibilityExpressionFilter(visibilityTags,
402      VisibilityConstants.SORTED_ORDINAL_SERIALIZATION_FORMAT));
403    try (RegionScanner scanner = ctx.getEnvironment().getRegion().getScanner(new Scan(get))) {
404      // NOTE: Please don't use HRegion.get() instead,
405      // because it will copy cells to heap. See HBASE-26036
406      List<Cell> result = new ArrayList<>();
407      scanner.next(result);
408
409      if (result.size() < get.getMaxVersions()) {
410        // Nothing to delete
411        PrivateCellUtil.updateLatestStamp(cell, byteNow);
412        return;
413      }
414      if (result.size() > get.getMaxVersions()) {
415        throw new RuntimeException(
416          "Unexpected size: " + result.size() + ". Results more than the max versions obtained.");
417      }
418      Cell getCell = result.get(get.getMaxVersions() - 1);
419      PrivateCellUtil.setTimestamp(cell, getCell.getTimestamp());
420    }
421    // We are bypassing here because in the HRegion.updateDeleteLatestVersionTimeStamp we would
422    // update with the current timestamp after again doing a get. As the hook as already determined
423    // the needed timestamp we need to bypass here.
424    // TODO : See if HRegion.updateDeleteLatestVersionTimeStamp() could be
425    // called only if the hook is not called.
426    ctx.bypass();
427  }
428
429  /**
430   * Checks whether cell contains any tag with type as VISIBILITY_TAG_TYPE. This tag type is
431   * reserved and should not be explicitly set by user.
432   * @param cell The cell under consideration
433   * @param pair An optional pair of type {@code <Boolean, Tag>} which would be reused if already
434   *             set and new one will be created if NULL is passed
435   * @return If the boolean is false then it indicates that the cell has a RESERVERD_VIS_TAG and
436   *         with boolean as true, not null tag indicates that a string modified tag was found.
437   */
438  private Pair<Boolean, Tag> checkForReservedVisibilityTagPresence(ExtendedCell cell,
439    Pair<Boolean, Tag> pair) throws IOException {
440    if (pair == null) {
441      pair = new Pair<>(false, null);
442    } else {
443      pair.setFirst(false);
444      pair.setSecond(null);
445    }
446    // Bypass this check when the operation is done by a system/super user.
447    // This is done because, while Replication, the Cells coming to the peer cluster with reserved
448    // typed tags and this is fine and should get added to the peer cluster table
449    if (isSystemOrSuperUser()) {
450      // Does the cell contain special tag which indicates that the replicated
451      // cell visiblilty tags
452      // have been modified
453      Tag modifiedTag = null;
454      Iterator<Tag> tagsIterator = PrivateCellUtil.tagsIterator(cell);
455      while (tagsIterator.hasNext()) {
456        Tag tag = tagsIterator.next();
457        if (tag.getType() == TagType.STRING_VIS_TAG_TYPE) {
458          modifiedTag = tag;
459          break;
460        }
461      }
462      pair.setFirst(true);
463      pair.setSecond(modifiedTag);
464      return pair;
465    }
466    Iterator<Tag> tagsItr = PrivateCellUtil.tagsIterator(cell);
467    while (tagsItr.hasNext()) {
468      if (RESERVED_VIS_TAG_TYPES.contains(tagsItr.next().getType())) {
469        return pair;
470      }
471    }
472    pair.setFirst(true);
473    return pair;
474  }
475
476  private void removeReplicationVisibilityTag(List<Tag> tags) throws IOException {
477    Iterator<Tag> iterator = tags.iterator();
478    while (iterator.hasNext()) {
479      Tag tag = iterator.next();
480      if (tag.getType() == TagType.STRING_VIS_TAG_TYPE) {
481        iterator.remove();
482        break;
483      }
484    }
485  }
486
487  @Override
488  public void preScannerOpen(ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> e, Scan scan)
489    throws IOException {
490    if (!initialized) {
491      throw new VisibilityControllerNotReadyException("VisibilityController not yet initialized!");
492    }
493    // Nothing to do if authorization is not enabled
494    if (!authorizationEnabled) {
495      return;
496    }
497    Region region = e.getEnvironment().getRegion();
498    Authorizations authorizations = null;
499    try {
500      authorizations = scan.getAuthorizations();
501    } catch (DeserializationException de) {
502      throw new IOException(de);
503    }
504    if (authorizations == null) {
505      // No Authorizations present for this scan/Get!
506      // In case of system tables other than "labels" just scan with out visibility check and
507      // filtering. Checking visibility labels for META and NAMESPACE table is not needed.
508      TableName table = region.getRegionInfo().getTable();
509      if (table.isSystemTable() && !table.equals(LABELS_TABLE_NAME)) {
510        return;
511      }
512    }
513
514    Filter visibilityLabelFilter =
515      VisibilityUtils.createVisibilityLabelFilter(region, authorizations);
516    if (visibilityLabelFilter != null) {
517      Filter filter = scan.getFilter();
518      if (filter != null) {
519        scan.setFilter(new FilterList(filter, visibilityLabelFilter));
520      } else {
521        scan.setFilter(visibilityLabelFilter);
522      }
523    }
524  }
525
526  @Override
527  public DeleteTracker postInstantiateDeleteTracker(
528    ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> ctx, DeleteTracker delTracker)
529    throws IOException {
530    // Nothing to do if we are not filtering by visibility
531    if (!authorizationEnabled) {
532      return delTracker;
533    }
534    Region region = ctx.getEnvironment().getRegion();
535    TableName table = region.getRegionInfo().getTable();
536    if (table.isSystemTable()) {
537      return delTracker;
538    }
539    // We are creating a new type of delete tracker here which is able to track
540    // the timestamps and also the
541    // visibility tags per cell. The covering cells are determined not only
542    // based on the delete type and ts
543    // but also on the visibility expression matching.
544    return new VisibilityScanDeleteTracker(delTracker.getCellComparator());
545  }
546
547  @Override
548  public RegionScanner postScannerOpen(final ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> c,
549    final Scan scan, final RegionScanner s) throws IOException {
550    User user = VisibilityUtils.getActiveUser();
551    if (user != null && user.getShortName() != null) {
552      scannerOwners.put(s, user.getShortName());
553    }
554    return s;
555  }
556
557  @Override
558  public boolean preScannerNext(final ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> c,
559    final InternalScanner s, final List<Result> result, final int limit, final boolean hasNext)
560    throws IOException {
561    requireScannerOwner(s);
562    return hasNext;
563  }
564
565  @Override
566  public void preScannerClose(final ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> c,
567    final InternalScanner s) throws IOException {
568    requireScannerOwner(s);
569  }
570
571  @Override
572  public void postScannerClose(final ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> c,
573    final InternalScanner s) throws IOException {
574    // clean up any associated owner mapping
575    scannerOwners.remove(s);
576  }
577
578  /**
579   * Verify, when servicing an RPC, that the caller is the scanner owner. If so, we assume that
580   * access control is correctly enforced based on the checks performed in preScannerOpen()
581   */
582  private void requireScannerOwner(InternalScanner s) throws AccessDeniedException {
583    if (!RpcServer.isInRpcCallContext()) return;
584    String requestUName = RpcServer.getRequestUserName().orElse(null);
585    String owner = scannerOwners.get(s);
586    if (authorizationEnabled && owner != null && !owner.equals(requestUName)) {
587      throw new AccessDeniedException("User '" + requestUName + "' is not the scanner owner!");
588    }
589  }
590
591  @Override
592  public void preGetOp(ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> e, Get get, List<Cell> results)
593    throws IOException {
594    if (!initialized) {
595      throw new VisibilityControllerNotReadyException("VisibilityController not yet initialized");
596    }
597    // Nothing useful to do if authorization is not enabled
598    if (!authorizationEnabled) {
599      return;
600    }
601    Region region = e.getEnvironment().getRegion();
602    Authorizations authorizations = null;
603    try {
604      authorizations = get.getAuthorizations();
605    } catch (DeserializationException de) {
606      throw new IOException(de);
607    }
608    if (authorizations == null) {
609      // No Authorizations present for this scan/Get!
610      // In case of system tables other than "labels" just scan with out visibility check and
611      // filtering. Checking visibility labels for META and NAMESPACE table is not needed.
612      TableName table = region.getRegionInfo().getTable();
613      if (table.isSystemTable() && !table.equals(LABELS_TABLE_NAME)) {
614        return;
615      }
616    }
617    Filter visibilityLabelFilter =
618      VisibilityUtils.createVisibilityLabelFilter(e.getEnvironment().getRegion(), authorizations);
619    if (visibilityLabelFilter != null) {
620      Filter filter = get.getFilter();
621      if (filter != null) {
622        get.setFilter(new FilterList(filter, visibilityLabelFilter));
623      } else {
624        get.setFilter(visibilityLabelFilter);
625      }
626    }
627  }
628
629  private boolean isSystemOrSuperUser() throws IOException {
630    return Superusers.isSuperUser(VisibilityUtils.getActiveUser());
631  }
632
633  @Override
634  public List<Pair<Cell, Cell>> postIncrementBeforeWAL(
635    ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> ctx, Mutation mutation,
636    List<Pair<Cell, Cell>> cellPairs) throws IOException {
637    List<Pair<Cell, Cell>> resultPairs = new ArrayList<>(cellPairs.size());
638    for (Pair<Cell, Cell> pair : cellPairs) {
639      resultPairs.add(new Pair<>(pair.getFirst(),
640        createNewCellWithTags(mutation, (ExtendedCell) pair.getSecond())));
641    }
642    return resultPairs;
643  }
644
645  @Override
646  public List<Pair<Cell, Cell>> postAppendBeforeWAL(
647    ObserverContext<RegionCoprocessorEnvironment> ctx, Mutation mutation,
648    List<Pair<Cell, Cell>> cellPairs) throws IOException {
649    List<Pair<Cell, Cell>> resultPairs = new ArrayList<>(cellPairs.size());
650    for (Pair<Cell, Cell> pair : cellPairs) {
651      resultPairs.add(new Pair<>(pair.getFirst(),
652        createNewCellWithTags(mutation, (ExtendedCell) pair.getSecond())));
653    }
654    return resultPairs;
655  }
656
657  private Cell createNewCellWithTags(Mutation mutation, ExtendedCell newCell) throws IOException {
658    List<Tag> tags = Lists.newArrayList();
659    CellVisibility cellVisibility = null;
660    try {
661      cellVisibility = mutation.getCellVisibility();
662    } catch (DeserializationException e) {
663      throw new IOException(e);
664    }
665    if (cellVisibility == null) {
666      return newCell;
667    }
668    // Prepend new visibility tags to a new list of tags for the cell
669    // Don't check user auths for labels with Mutations when the user is super user
670    boolean authCheck = authorizationEnabled && checkAuths && !(isSystemOrSuperUser());
671    tags.addAll(this.visibilityLabelService.createVisibilityExpTags(cellVisibility.getExpression(),
672      true, authCheck));
673    // Carry forward all other tags
674    Iterator<Tag> tagsItr = PrivateCellUtil.tagsIterator(newCell);
675    while (tagsItr.hasNext()) {
676      Tag tag = tagsItr.next();
677      if (
678        tag.getType() != TagType.VISIBILITY_TAG_TYPE
679          && tag.getType() != TagType.VISIBILITY_EXP_SERIALIZATION_FORMAT_TAG_TYPE
680      ) {
681        tags.add(tag);
682      }
683    }
684
685    return PrivateCellUtil.createCell(newCell, tags);
686  }
687
688  /******************************
689   * VisibilityEndpoint service related methods
690   ******************************/
691  @Override
692  public synchronized void addLabels(RpcController controller, VisibilityLabelsRequest request,
693    RpcCallback<VisibilityLabelsResponse> done) {
694    VisibilityLabelsResponse.Builder response = VisibilityLabelsResponse.newBuilder();
695    List<VisibilityLabel> visLabels = request.getVisLabelList();
696    if (!initialized) {
697      setExceptionResults(visLabels.size(),
698        new VisibilityControllerNotReadyException("VisibilityController not yet initialized!"),
699        response);
700    } else {
701      List<byte[]> labels = new ArrayList<>(visLabels.size());
702      try {
703        if (authorizationEnabled) {
704          checkCallingUserAuth();
705        }
706        RegionActionResult successResult = RegionActionResult.newBuilder().build();
707        for (VisibilityLabel visLabel : visLabels) {
708          byte[] label = visLabel.getLabel().toByteArray();
709          labels.add(label);
710          response.addResult(successResult); // Just mark as success. Later it will get reset
711                                             // based on the result from
712                                             // visibilityLabelService.addLabels ()
713        }
714        if (!labels.isEmpty()) {
715          OperationStatus[] opStatus = this.visibilityLabelService.addLabels(labels);
716          logResult(true, "addLabels", "Adding labels allowed", null, labels, null);
717          int i = 0;
718          for (OperationStatus status : opStatus) {
719            while (!Objects.equals(response.getResult(i), successResult)) {
720              i++;
721            }
722            if (status.getOperationStatusCode() != SUCCESS) {
723              RegionActionResult.Builder failureResultBuilder = RegionActionResult.newBuilder();
724              failureResultBuilder
725                .setException(buildException(new DoNotRetryIOException(status.getExceptionMsg())));
726              response.setResult(i, failureResultBuilder.build());
727            }
728            i++;
729          }
730        }
731      } catch (AccessDeniedException e) {
732        logResult(false, "addLabels", e.getMessage(), null, labels, null);
733        LOG.error("User is not having required permissions to add labels", e);
734        setExceptionResults(visLabels.size(), e, response);
735      } catch (IOException e) {
736        LOG.error(e.toString(), e);
737        setExceptionResults(visLabels.size(), e, response);
738      }
739    }
740    done.run(response.build());
741  }
742
743  private void setExceptionResults(int size, IOException e,
744    VisibilityLabelsResponse.Builder response) {
745    RegionActionResult.Builder failureResultBuilder = RegionActionResult.newBuilder();
746    failureResultBuilder.setException(buildException(e));
747    RegionActionResult failureResult = failureResultBuilder.build();
748    for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
749      response.addResult(i, failureResult);
750    }
751  }
752
753  @Override
754  public synchronized void setAuths(RpcController controller, SetAuthsRequest request,
755    RpcCallback<VisibilityLabelsResponse> done) {
756    VisibilityLabelsResponse.Builder response = VisibilityLabelsResponse.newBuilder();
757    List<ByteString> auths = request.getAuthList();
758    if (!initialized) {
759      setExceptionResults(auths.size(),
760        new VisibilityControllerNotReadyException("VisibilityController not yet initialized!"),
761        response);
762    } else {
763      byte[] user = request.getUser().toByteArray();
764      List<byte[]> labelAuths = new ArrayList<>(auths.size());
765      try {
766        if (authorizationEnabled) {
767          checkCallingUserAuth();
768        }
769        for (ByteString authBS : auths) {
770          labelAuths.add(authBS.toByteArray());
771        }
772        OperationStatus[] opStatus = this.visibilityLabelService.setAuths(user, labelAuths);
773        logResult(true, "setAuths", "Setting authorization for labels allowed", user, labelAuths,
774          null);
775        RegionActionResult successResult = RegionActionResult.newBuilder().build();
776        for (OperationStatus status : opStatus) {
777          if (status.getOperationStatusCode() == SUCCESS) {
778            response.addResult(successResult);
779          } else {
780            RegionActionResult.Builder failureResultBuilder = RegionActionResult.newBuilder();
781            failureResultBuilder
782              .setException(buildException(new DoNotRetryIOException(status.getExceptionMsg())));
783            response.addResult(failureResultBuilder.build());
784          }
785        }
786      } catch (AccessDeniedException e) {
787        logResult(false, "setAuths", e.getMessage(), user, labelAuths, null);
788        LOG.error("User is not having required permissions to set authorization", e);
789        setExceptionResults(auths.size(), e, response);
790      } catch (IOException e) {
791        LOG.error(e.toString(), e);
792        setExceptionResults(auths.size(), e, response);
793      }
794    }
795    done.run(response.build());
796  }
797
798  private void logResult(boolean isAllowed, String request, String reason, byte[] user,
799    List<byte[]> labelAuths, String regex) {
800    if (AUDITLOG.isTraceEnabled()) {
801      // This is more duplicated code!
802      List<String> labelAuthsStr = new ArrayList<>();
803      if (labelAuths != null) {
804        int labelAuthsSize = labelAuths.size();
805        labelAuthsStr = new ArrayList<>(labelAuthsSize);
806        for (int i = 0; i < labelAuthsSize; i++) {
807          labelAuthsStr.add(Bytes.toString(labelAuths.get(i)));
808        }
809      }
810
811      User requestingUser = null;
812      try {
813        requestingUser = VisibilityUtils.getActiveUser();
814      } catch (IOException e) {
815        LOG.warn("Failed to get active system user.");
816        LOG.debug("Details on failure to get active system user.", e);
817      }
818      AUDITLOG.trace("Access " + (isAllowed ? "allowed" : "denied") + " for user "
819        + (requestingUser != null ? requestingUser.getShortName() : "UNKNOWN") + "; reason: "
820        + reason + "; remote address: "
821        + RpcServer.getRemoteAddress().map(InetAddress::toString).orElse("") + "; request: "
822        + request + "; user: " + (user != null ? Bytes.toShort(user) : "null") + "; labels: "
823        + labelAuthsStr + "; regex: " + regex);
824    }
825  }
826
827  @Override
828  public synchronized void getAuths(RpcController controller, GetAuthsRequest request,
829    RpcCallback<GetAuthsResponse> done) {
830    GetAuthsResponse.Builder response = GetAuthsResponse.newBuilder();
831    if (!initialized) {
832      controller.setFailed("VisibilityController not yet initialized");
833    } else {
834      byte[] user = request.getUser().toByteArray();
835      List<String> labels = null;
836      try {
837        // We do ACL check here as we create scanner directly on region. It will not make calls to
838        // AccessController CP methods.
839        if (authorizationEnabled && accessControllerAvailable && !isSystemOrSuperUser()) {
840          User requestingUser = VisibilityUtils.getActiveUser();
841          throw new AccessDeniedException(
842            "User '" + (requestingUser != null ? requestingUser.getShortName() : "null")
843              + "' is not authorized to perform this action.");
844        }
845        if (AuthUtil.isGroupPrincipal(Bytes.toString(user))) {
846          String group = AuthUtil.getGroupName(Bytes.toString(user));
847          labels = this.visibilityLabelService.getGroupAuths(new String[] { group }, false);
848        } else {
849          labels = this.visibilityLabelService.getUserAuths(user, false);
850        }
851        logResult(true, "getAuths", "Get authorizations for user allowed", user, null, null);
852      } catch (AccessDeniedException e) {
853        logResult(false, "getAuths", e.getMessage(), user, null, null);
854        CoprocessorRpcUtils.setControllerException(controller, e);
855      } catch (IOException e) {
856        CoprocessorRpcUtils.setControllerException(controller, e);
857      }
858      response.setUser(request.getUser());
859      if (labels != null) {
860        for (String label : labels) {
861          response.addAuth(ByteString.copyFrom(Bytes.toBytes(label)));
862        }
863      }
864    }
865    done.run(response.build());
866  }
867
868  @Override
869  public synchronized void clearAuths(RpcController controller, SetAuthsRequest request,
870    RpcCallback<VisibilityLabelsResponse> done) {
871    VisibilityLabelsResponse.Builder response = VisibilityLabelsResponse.newBuilder();
872    List<ByteString> auths = request.getAuthList();
873    if (!initialized) {
874      setExceptionResults(auths.size(),
875        new CoprocessorException("VisibilityController not yet initialized"), response);
876    } else {
877      byte[] requestUser = request.getUser().toByteArray();
878      List<byte[]> labelAuths = new ArrayList<>(auths.size());
879      try {
880        // When AC is ON, do AC based user auth check
881        if (authorizationEnabled && accessControllerAvailable && !isSystemOrSuperUser()) {
882          User user = VisibilityUtils.getActiveUser();
883          throw new AccessDeniedException("User '" + (user != null ? user.getShortName() : "null")
884            + " is not authorized to perform this action.");
885        }
886        if (authorizationEnabled) {
887          checkCallingUserAuth(); // When AC is not in place the calling user should have
888                                  // SYSTEM_LABEL auth to do this action.
889        }
890        for (ByteString authBS : auths) {
891          labelAuths.add(authBS.toByteArray());
892        }
893
894        OperationStatus[] opStatus =
895          this.visibilityLabelService.clearAuths(requestUser, labelAuths);
896        logResult(true, "clearAuths", "Removing authorization for labels allowed", requestUser,
897          labelAuths, null);
898        RegionActionResult successResult = RegionActionResult.newBuilder().build();
899        for (OperationStatus status : opStatus) {
900          if (status.getOperationStatusCode() == SUCCESS) {
901            response.addResult(successResult);
902          } else {
903            RegionActionResult.Builder failureResultBuilder = RegionActionResult.newBuilder();
904            failureResultBuilder
905              .setException(buildException(new DoNotRetryIOException(status.getExceptionMsg())));
906            response.addResult(failureResultBuilder.build());
907          }
908        }
909      } catch (AccessDeniedException e) {
910        logResult(false, "clearAuths", e.getMessage(), requestUser, labelAuths, null);
911        LOG.error("User is not having required permissions to clear authorization", e);
912        setExceptionResults(auths.size(), e, response);
913      } catch (IOException e) {
914        LOG.error(e.toString(), e);
915        setExceptionResults(auths.size(), e, response);
916      }
917    }
918    done.run(response.build());
919  }
920
921  @Override
922  public synchronized void listLabels(RpcController controller, ListLabelsRequest request,
923    RpcCallback<ListLabelsResponse> done) {
924    ListLabelsResponse.Builder response = ListLabelsResponse.newBuilder();
925    if (!initialized) {
926      controller.setFailed("VisibilityController not yet initialized");
927    } else {
928      List<String> labels = null;
929      String regex = request.hasRegex() ? request.getRegex() : null;
930      try {
931        // We do ACL check here as we create scanner directly on region. It will not make calls to
932        // AccessController CP methods.
933        if (authorizationEnabled && accessControllerAvailable && !isSystemOrSuperUser()) {
934          User requestingUser = VisibilityUtils.getActiveUser();
935          throw new AccessDeniedException(
936            "User '" + (requestingUser != null ? requestingUser.getShortName() : "null")
937              + "' is not authorized to perform this action.");
938        }
939        labels = this.visibilityLabelService.listLabels(regex);
940        logResult(true, "listLabels", "Listing labels allowed", null, null, regex);
941      } catch (AccessDeniedException e) {
942        logResult(false, "listLabels", e.getMessage(), null, null, regex);
943        CoprocessorRpcUtils.setControllerException(controller, e);
944      } catch (IOException e) {
945        CoprocessorRpcUtils.setControllerException(controller, e);
946      }
947      if (labels != null && !labels.isEmpty()) {
948        for (String label : labels) {
949          response.addLabel(ByteString.copyFrom(Bytes.toBytes(label)));
950        }
951      }
952    }
953    done.run(response.build());
954  }
955
956  private void checkCallingUserAuth() throws IOException {
957    if (!authorizationEnabled) { // Redundant, but just in case
958      return;
959    }
960    if (!accessControllerAvailable) {
961      User user = VisibilityUtils.getActiveUser();
962      if (user == null) {
963        throw new IOException("Unable to retrieve calling user");
964      }
965      if (!(this.visibilityLabelService.havingSystemAuth(user))) {
966        throw new AccessDeniedException(
967          "User '" + user.getShortName() + "' is not authorized to perform this action.");
968      }
969    }
970  }
971
972  private static class DeleteVersionVisibilityExpressionFilter extends FilterBase {
973    private List<Tag> deleteCellVisTags;
974    private Byte deleteCellVisTagsFormat;
975
976    public DeleteVersionVisibilityExpressionFilter(List<Tag> deleteCellVisTags,
977      Byte deleteCellVisTagsFormat) {
978      this.deleteCellVisTags = deleteCellVisTags;
979      this.deleteCellVisTagsFormat = deleteCellVisTagsFormat;
980    }
981
982    @Override
983    public boolean filterRowKey(Cell cell) throws IOException {
984      // Impl in FilterBase might do unnecessary copy for Off heap backed Cells.
985      return false;
986    }
987
988    @Override
989    public ReturnCode filterCell(final Cell cell) throws IOException {
990      List<Tag> putVisTags = new ArrayList<>();
991      Byte putCellVisTagsFormat = null;
992      if (cell instanceof ExtendedCell) {
993        putCellVisTagsFormat =
994          VisibilityUtils.extractVisibilityTags((ExtendedCell) cell, putVisTags);
995      }
996
997      if (putVisTags.isEmpty() && deleteCellVisTags.isEmpty()) {
998        // Early out if there are no tags in the cell
999        return ReturnCode.INCLUDE;
1000      }
1001      boolean matchFound =
1002        VisibilityLabelServiceManager.getInstance().getVisibilityLabelService().matchVisibility(
1003          putVisTags, putCellVisTagsFormat, deleteCellVisTags, deleteCellVisTagsFormat);
1004      return matchFound ? ReturnCode.INCLUDE : ReturnCode.SKIP;
1005    }
1006
1007    @Override
1008    public boolean equals(Object obj) {
1009      if (!(obj instanceof DeleteVersionVisibilityExpressionFilter)) {
1010        return false;
1011      }
1012      if (this == obj) {
1013        return true;
1014      }
1015      DeleteVersionVisibilityExpressionFilter f = (DeleteVersionVisibilityExpressionFilter) obj;
1016      return this.deleteCellVisTags.equals(f.deleteCellVisTags)
1017        && this.deleteCellVisTagsFormat.equals(f.deleteCellVisTagsFormat);
1018    }
1019
1020    @Override
1021    public int hashCode() {
1022      return Objects.hash(this.deleteCellVisTags, this.deleteCellVisTagsFormat);
1023    }
1024  }
1025
1026  /** Returns NameValuePair of the exception name to stringified version os exception. */
1027  // Copied from ResponseConverter and made private. Only used in here.
1028  private static NameBytesPair buildException(final Throwable t) {
1029    NameBytesPair.Builder parameterBuilder = NameBytesPair.newBuilder();
1030    parameterBuilder.setName(t.getClass().getName());
1031    parameterBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFromUtf8(StringUtils.stringifyException(t)));
1032    return parameterBuilder.build();
1033  }
1034}
